channel.title: CVE Feed for Leap13 -- Premium Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Leap13 -- Premium Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-37519|2024-08-02T03:57:39.727Z -- leap13 -- premium%20blocks%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Leap13 Premium Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Premium Blocks – Gutenberg Blocks for WordPress: from n/a through 2.1.27.
